page.title: 04One Week's Leisure Time - 1
page.content: On a Monday my leisure time is after school. I have guides in the South Esk church from 7 o clock to 9 o clock. We have 5 patrols called after flowers. I am in the Primroses patrol. I have been in the guides for about a year and a half. We have to pay 30 pence for guide funds. I also have an orchestra practice for about 5 months every year. I play a cello which is a big version of a viola. On a Tuesday I usually just go out to the back garden and play with my next door neighbour. Or some nights I just sit in and watch a comedy on T.V. On a Wednesday I go to Highland Dancing from 4.45 pm to 6.30 pm. We pay Â£20 for 10 weeks. That is for a lesson ona Saturday and Wednesday. I enjoy my dancing but it is hard work. I am on my gold bar grade just now.
